pkgmetadata.longdescription: Import Data from a RRD (Round Robin Database) File // Makes it easy to import the data from a 'RRD' database (https://oss.oetiker.ch/rrdtool/) directly into R data structures. The resulting objects are 'tibble' objects or a list of 'tibble' objects, making it easy to manipulate the data. The package uses `librrd` to import the numerical data in a `RRD` database directly into R data structures without using intermediate formats.
